Container.Name: UnoEuroDNS
Container.Description: Keep your DNS records for your own domains updated with this UnoEuro DDNS script. [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] Where UnoEuroDNS should store settings[br] [b]DOMAIN:[/b] The name of the domain (product) you wish to update (without www). Can be in punycode format. Ie. "example.com"[br] [b]HOSTNAME:[/b] The name of the A record you wish to update. The domain should not be appended to this. Ie. use "home", not "home.example.com"[br] [b]APIKEY:[/b] The API key for the UnoEuro account. Found in UnoEuro's controlpanel[br] [b]PUSHBULLET_ACCESS_TOKEN:[/b] The access token for the Pushbullet API. Found on https://www.pushbullet.com/#settings/account . Leave empty for disabling this feature.[br]
Container.Overview: Keep your DNS records for your own domains updated with this UnoEuro DDNS script.
